**This Repo is part of the inspirezone Dev Community Coding Challenges. Please read challenge details below.  
[JOIN THE COMMUNITY HERE](https://community.inspirezone.tech/).**

**You are welcome to contribute to this repo. If you want to contribute please read the [**CONTRIBUTING.md**](./CONTRIBUTING.md) for step by step details of how to submit an entry.**

## üìú Rules of this challenge üìú

### Guidelines in making an entry for this challenge
‚úîÔ∏è Use any language of your choice.

‚úîÔ∏è Solution should at minimum ask for user input of 2 numbers.

‚úîÔ∏è Solution should at minimum be able to add, subtract, multiply, divide.

‚úîÔ∏è Can be command line based or GUI based.

‚úîÔ∏è Create a README.md with instructions for how to run your code.

## üíª How to Join in üíª 
The inspirezone dev community is on Discord and this challenge is managed through there. If you are already a member of the Discord server you would have received instructions for how to participate.

However, you don't have to join the community to contribute to this repo. Everyone is welcome to issue a pull request! However, recognition of completing challenges and badge awards for each of our challenges will only be given to inspirezone community members.

*If you haven't [signed up](https://community.inspirezone.tech/) to the inspirezone community you can still [join the Discord server](https://discord.gg/EwwBgXkh5a) as a Guest.*

## ‚è≤Ô∏è Submission deadlines ‚è≤Ô∏è 
Challenge is open for now. Closing date to be announced a week in advance.

## üèÖ Awards & Recognition üèÖ
***Available for [inspirezone community members](https://community.inspirezone.tech) only.***

By participating and submitting a working entry for a challenge you will receive a **custom shields badge** with your GitHub username. 

Here‚Äôs how the award badge for this challenge will look like (design may change).
![Inspirezone Calculator Challenge Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Inspirezone%20Calculator%20Challenge-Completed%20by%20Your__GitHub__Name__Here-%23caefcc?style=for-the-badge)

Badges awarded to you will be featured on this inspirezone GitHub repository. You can also freely use any badges awarded to you and feature it on your GitHub profile or anywhere!

Each badge you earn counts and we'll reveal why over time üòâ So grab as many as you can with each challenge!
 
Of course the BEST award is participating and keeping yourself active and those coding skills sharp üòÅ

## ‚ùì Questions ‚ùì

Ask on the Discord server. Inspirezone members have access to the coding challenge discussions where you can ask questions or discuss anything relating to this challenge!  

Or ask your questions by creating an [ISSUE](../../issues) on this repo.

Happy coding!
